ygData.subject: RE: Bind for Guk?
ygData.msgSnippet: Damn you guys got me all nervous now! LOL. Seriously, I prob wouldnt try it until atleast you havw 200+hp, I bound in grobb and NEVER had a problem getting out
ygData.messageBody:
Damn you guys got me all nervous now! LOL. Seriously, I prob wouldnt try it
until atleast you havw 200+hp, I bound in grobb and NEVER had a problem
getting out or killed. Sometimes I would get wacked for 96 twice but no
more, I NEVER TOOK OVER 200pts at 12th level in dmg. At 7th though he might
deal you 150 a pop though. I dontn lie, it is dangerous, but I can testify
at 12th and up it isnt a prob. Both of my monk brothers ae bound in grobb
and neither has had a problem getting out either. Its a game, take a
chance!, bind in GROBB, but never ever piss off a shin shaman, it's
humiliating being rooted and beat down!!!!!
